configure_whatsapp_embedded_signup_descr: Configure Facebook App credentials and settings for WhatsApp Embedded Signup integration.
enable_embedded_signup_help: Allow tenants to connect their WhatsApp Business Account through Facebook's embedded signup flow.
facebook_app_id_help: Your Facebook App ID from the Facebook Developer Console.
facebook_app_secret_help: Your Facebook App Secret from the Facebook Developer Console.
facebook_config_id_help: Optional configuration ID for advanced Facebook app settings.
webhook_verify_token_help: Token used to verify webhook requests from Facebook.
step_create_facebook_app_desc: Create a new Facebook app in the Facebook Developer Console with Business type.
step_add_whatsapp_product_desc: Add WhatsApp Business API product to your Facebook app.
step_configure_embedded_signup_desc: Set up Facebook Login for Business and configure redirect URIs.
step_set_webhook_url_desc: Configure webhook URL in your Facebook app settings.

contact_administrator_to_configure: Please contact your administrator to configure the service
emb_signup_info: Seamlessly authenticate users with their Facebook account using our embedded sign-in feature. No redirects, just smooth onboarding
language_auto_translation: System will auto-translate field labels and descriptions when possible
use_alphanumeric_characters: Use only letters, numbers, and underscores
no_spaces_allowed: No spaces allowed in field names
text_field_description: Single line of text, perfect for names, titles, or short answers
textarea_field_description: Multiple lines of text, ideal for descriptions or longer content
number_field_description: Numeric values only, great for age, quantity, or measurements
date_field_description: Date picker for birth dates, schedules, or deadlines
dropdown_field_description: Select from predefined options, perfect for categorization
checkbox_field_description: Yes/No or True/False selection, perfect for agreements or boolean options

payment_initialization_failed_try_again: Payment initialization failed. Please try again.

paystack_gateway_description: Pay securely with Paystack - Cards, Bank Transfer, USSD, and Mobile Money supported.
total_sent_tooltip: Total messages sent to WhatsApp API. This includes all messages: delivered + read + failed + sent successfully.
total_delivered_tooltip: Messages successfully delivered to recipient's WhatsApp. This confirms the message reached their device (confirmed by Meta WhatsApp API).
total_read_tooltip: Messages that were opened and read by the contact. This means the recipient actually viewed your message content (confirmed by Meta WhatsApp API).
total_failed_tooltip: Messages that failed to send due to errors from Meta WhatsApp API. This could be due to invalid phone numbers, blocked contacts, template issues, or other delivery failures.
select_template_and_bind_variables_note: Choose a WhatsApp template and map its variables to merge fields

enter_valid_payload: Enter a valid JSON payload for webhook endpoint.
finalize_url: This URL will be finalized after creating the webhook

webhook_event_assignment_info: A single webhook should only be assigned to one event or similar events to prevent message delivery issues.
